attributes.action: Ban all forms of motor sport be it on land or water based in an effort to reduce carbon emissions from this unnecessary waste of fuel.Including the Red Arrow display team. What good do they do ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/motocross-enduro/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
